meanings.definition: The quality or state of being deliverable.
meanings.sent1: The deliverabilities of the packages were exceptional.
meanings.sent2: We need to improve the deliverabilities of our services.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best deliverabilities was fierce among the companies.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to improving the deliverabilities of the team was commendable.
meanings.sent5: The deliverabilities of the products determined their success in the market.

meanings.sent1: The fragile items had high deliverabilities due to proper packaging.
meanings.sent2: The deliverabilities of the mail service were affected by the storm.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's special power was his incredible deliverabilities.
meanings.sent4: The deliverabilities of the message were crucial for the mission's success.
meanings.sent5: The company's success relied on the deliverabilities of its products.
